sectionHeader.title: Three Ways to Transform Your Document Processing
sectionHeader.subtitle: From enterprise deployment to specialized industry solutions - choose the approach that fits your needs.

services.title: Enterprise RAG Platform
services.description: Deploy our advanced document intelligence system on-premise, via API, or Docker. Perfect for organizations needing secure, customizable document processing.

services.title: Tender Intelligence Suite
services.description: Complete tender analysis, competitor intelligence, and bid preparation automation. Transform weeks of manual work into strategic advantage.

services.title: Project Intelligence Platform
services.description: BOQ automation, cost estimation, and project scoping for construction, insurance, and project-based businesses. Eliminate manual calculations and reduce errors.
